metadata.title: CVE-2023-4895 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE affecting all versions startingfrom 12.0 to 16.7.6, all versions starting from 16.8 before 16.8.3, allversions starting from 16.9 before 16.9.1. This vulnerability allows forbypassing the 'group ip restriction' settings to access environment detailsof projects

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
